methods.name: add_notes
methods.description: Add flags to messages in the currently folder. flags should be a list (e.g. [“important”, “deadline”]).

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copy this message from src_folder to dst_folder

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete one or more messages from the currently selected folder.

methods.name: get_sender
methods.description: Return a sender of this message.
